data.title: Scotch Business Directory
data.meta_description: Welcome to Perth’s Scotch College, one of Australia’s leading schools for boys. Scotch College has been at the forefront of education since its foundation in 1897.
data.text:
VIEW DIRECTORY

Supported by the Old Scotch Collegians, the Scotch Business Directory features local, regional, national and global businesses founded by our alumni, parents and members of the Scotch community. We encourage our community to support locally owned businesses as much as possible.

Disclaimer

You are viewing the Scotch College Business Directory (Directory).

The Directory has been established by the College and Committee of the OSC to promote connection between its members and the broader members of the Scotch College community.

The OSC nor the College make no representation as to the accuracy or truth of the matters contained within the Directory. You therefore rely on the contents of the Directory at your own risk. You should seek independent professional advice, such as, for example, from independent financial advisers, where appropriate before engaging any of the persons on the Directory.

To the maximum extent permitted by law, the OSC and the College disclaim all liability for the operation of the Directory and users rely on the Directory entirely at their own risk.

Featuring your business

Scotch is pleased to feature businesses free-of-charge. We encourage participating business to provide a special offer for the Scotch community or work experience opportunities for our students where possible.

If you would like to have your business featured, please complete the below form.

Please note being featured in the directory does not constitute an endorsement by Scotch College. The College takes no responsibility for the results of any commercial transaction or collaboration as per the terms outlined in the Disclaimer.
